member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfigurationVersion
member.remarks: Keeps this enum aligned with the get/set settings services. Each version of the settings should have its corresponding web service. Additionally, each version should have its corresponding 'CommonSettingsConverter' to downcast itself to the IMMEDIATE previous version of the setting.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfigurationConverter
member.summary: The base class of all common settings converters.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfigurationConverter.#ctor(Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfigurationVersion,Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfigurationConverter)
member.param: The version of the settings that's supported by this converter.
(optional) The converter to be chained to this one (typically the one for the immediate previous version of the setting).

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfigurationConverter.Convert(Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfiguration,Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfigurationVersion)
member.summary: Converts the configuration to the target version.
member.param: The configuration to be converted.
The target version of the configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfigurationConverter.Convert(Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.ProjectProcessConfiguration,Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfigurationVersion)
member.summary: Converts the configuration to the target version.
member.param: The configuration to be converted.
The target version of the configuration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfigurationConverter.DoConversion(Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfiguration)
member.summary: The actual work of converting this version of the configuration to the immediate previous one.
member.param: The configuration to be converted.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfigurationConverter.DoConversion(Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.ProjectProcessConfiguration)
member.summary: The actual work of converting this version of the configuration to the immediate previous one.
member.param: The configuration to be converted.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfigurationConverterFactory.CreateConverterChain(Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfigurationVersion)
member.summary: Creates a chain of converters that can convert the current version of the common settings to any previous version.
member.remarks: Update this factory implementation whenever a newer version of the settings is introduced. For instance, when V4 is introduced, this should look like: CommonSettingsConverter converter = new V4CommonProjectConfigurationConverter( new V3CommonProjectConfigurationConverter( new V2CommonProjectConfigurationConverter()));

member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.ProjectProcessConfigurationService
member.summary: Public interface for the ProcessConfigurationService web service. Allows for process configuration items (such as task board/backlog settings) to be set/retrieved/validated.

member.summary: Flag to indicate if we support getting/setting the ProjectProcessConfiguration.

member.summary: Flag to indicate if we support Properties section.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.ProjectProcessConfigurationService.GetCommonConfiguration(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the Common process configuration for a Team Project
member.param: The uri of the team project the settings are associated with
member.returns: The common process configuration settings for the specified team project

member.summary: Called to set the Common process configuration for a Team Project
member.param: The uri of the project to associate these settings with
The common process configuration for the specified project

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.ProjectProcessConfigurationService.ValidateCommonConfiguration(System.String,Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProcessConfiguration.Client.CommonProjectConfiguration)
member.summary: Called to validate that the specified Common configuration is valid. Performs a deep validation if the projectUri is specified and will verify that specified fields exist, for example. If the project name is not specified it will do a shallow validation.
member.param: The uri of the project to validate the settings against. May be null
The common process configuration for the specified project

The settings for the team

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProjectManagement.Resources.OperationNotSuported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This operation is not supported against this version of Team Foundation Server..

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ProjectManagement.Resources.ProcessConfigOnOldServerNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to VS402352: This process configuration is not compatible with the version of the server you are trying to update. Server does not understand the following tags: Properties.
